price: 121. Ceux-là auront pour refuge la Géhenne, et ils ne trouveront aucune issue leur permettant d’y échapper.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ عَنۡهَا مَحِيصٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhum jahannamu walā yajidūna ʿanhā maḥīṣan
